DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study determine effect Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) wound heal Free Gingival Graft donor site ( FGGDS ) . Materials Methods : Forty patient require FGG select randomize control double blind prospective clinical trial . The FGGDS treat LLLT compare untreated control group . The Wound Healing Index ( WHI ) , tissue consistency , colour match ( CM ) , H2O2 bubble test evaluation complete wound epithelialization ( CWE ) record 3rd , 7th , 14th 21st day . The pain-burning level , number analgesic , bleed record 7 day . Donor area soft tissue thickness ( TT ) measure baseline 1st month .
DOC.brief_title: Low-level Laser Therapy Enhancing Wound Healing Preserving Tissue Thickness
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects Study Design This single center , randomize , double blind , prospective control clinical study perform evaluate healing time , wound epithelialization post-operative morbidity produce harvest FGG palate . The wound treat one follow method : sterile wet gauze pressure ( control ) LLLT ( test ) . The patient randomly assign one group periodontists toss coin . Forty patient require FGG select , verbal write informed consent obtain . To minimize difference related surgical technique , surgical procedure carry one experienced clinician . Pre-Surgical Treatments All select patient underwent professional periodontal prophylaxis phase , patient give proper oral hygiene instruction . Patients full mouth plaque score ( FMPS ) ˂20 % full mouth bleed score ( FMBS ) ˂20 % include study . The patient assign control test group coin toss method . Surgical Procedure After local anaesthesia , free gingival graft harvest follow : donor site extend distal line angle canine mesial line angle maxillary first molar conventional scalpel . An approximately 1.5 mm split-thickness rectangular-shaped ( 7x12 mm ) gingival graft obtain . The free gingival graft suture prepared recipient bed use size 5-0 resorbable suture . Test Group - LLLT The Ga-Al-As laser use LLLT wavelength 940 nm . The wound experimental group receive laser stimulation dose 8.6 J/cm2 , close describe dose ( 10 J/cm2 ) literature . The power output maintain constant 3 W continuous-wave ( cw ) mode ; pulse interval size 0.10 m , pulse length 0.05 ms. Laser energy apply via 400-µm optical fibre Whitening Pain Relief Handpiece® . The handpiece position distance approximately 1 mm proximal wound area perpendicularly non-contact mode . The spot area handpiece involve wound area . The application area actually similar probe spot area ( 2.8 cm2 ) . The wound area 7x12=0.84 cm2 . So spot area probe wider wind area include wound area . For reason , need move handpiece , keep constant . All surface wound irradiate lead total dosage 8.6 J/cm2 irradiation time 8 s. The energy wind area 7.2 J ( 0.84 cm2 x 8.6 J/cm2 =7.2 J ) . The specify laser dose initiate surgery repeat 3rd , 5th , 7th day operation . The cumulative dose 34.4 J/cm2 total . Control Group - LLLT Sham Sterile wet gauze press FGG donor site 5 min control group . The LLLT perform manner test group . However , irradiation occur push start button . Post operative care A non-eugenol pack place sutured FGG ( Coe-Pak™ Periodontal Dressing , GC America Inc. , IL , USA ) . An acrylic stent prepare protect palatal donor site place surgery recommend patient wear 7 day . Patients prescribe 500 mg paracetamol ( need ) 0.12 % chlorhexidine oral rinse twice day 2 week . The patient advise report adverse outcome recall 3rd , 7th , 14th , 21st 30th day ( 5th day LLT group ) . The suture remove 2 week . Evaluated Parameters All evaluation acquire one periodontist blind treatment assignment . The following parameter record : H2O2 bubble test screen complete epithelialization , Landry Wound Healing Index ( WHI ) , pain burn sensation VAS score , bleed ( yes/no ) , palatal tissue consistency , colour match , tissue thickness , number analgesic . Intra-Surgical Measurements Soft Tissue Thickness The thickness palatal soft tissue harvest area measure local anaesthesia . The measurement make approximately 5 mm apical gingival margin first premolar mean # 20 endodontic reamer silicon stopper . The thickness palatinae measure test control group . The penetration depth measure digital caliper . The dimension graft standardize sterile aluminium foil template 7x12 mm dimension . Subjective Assessments During 7 day FGG procedure , patient ask keep diary pain burning sensation use Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) evaluate intensity give event . The VAS score pain range 0 ( pain ) 100 ( severe pain ) , represent continuous line 10 cm length ; burn sensation score follow : 0 ( absent ) 100 ( severe burning ) . Additionally , patient ask report postoperative bleed 7 day `` Bleeding present ( + ) '' `` Bleeding absent ( - ) '' . Palatal Tissue Consistency The consistency palatal mucosa assess 3rd , 7th , 14th 21st day palpation blunt instrument score soft firm clinician blind treatment assignment . Colour match On 3rd , 7th , 14th 21st day , colour palatal mucosa assess compare adjacent opposite side use objective VAS ( VAS score 0−100 ) represent continuous line 10 cm length , clinician blind treatment group assignment . A score 0 indicate colour match , score 100 indicate good colour match adjacent tissue . Wound Epithelialization CWE ( complete Wound Epithelialization ) evaluate clinically peroxide bubble test . This primary outcome study . This test base principle epithelium discontinuous , H2O2 diffuse connective tissue , enzyme catalase act H2O2 release water oxygen , clinically observe production bubble wound . The area evaluate dry , 3 % H2O2 sprinkle wound syringe , follow period wait ( approximately 10 second ) appearance bubble , suggest surgical site completely epithelialized . Landry Wound Healing Index ( WHI ) The palatal wound score use Landy Wound Healing Index 3rd , 7th , 14th 21st day post operatively . This index evaluate wound base follow criterion : tissue colour , response palpation , incision margin suppuration . The score range 1-5 correspond bad excellent healing . The number analgesic Patients ask record number analgesic take pain relief first 7 post-operative day . Statistical Analysis The homogeneity data test Shapiro Wilk test . Non-parametric test use . SPSS v.17.0 ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , Illinois USA ) use analysis . The Mann-Whitney U test use analyze intergroup difference . Time dependent alteration analyze Wilcoxon test . The Binary Logistic Regression Analysis perform analyze factor affect epithelialization . Significance level p < 0.05 . Power Calculation The primary outcomeof study H2O2 test result . The power analysis perform ttp : //www.openepi.com/Menu/OE_Menu.htm . The power study calculate 98.86 % .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The absence systemic factor ( systemic disease , coagulation disorder , medication affect periodontal status , pregnancy lactation ) 2 . No smoke 3 . Patients full mouth plaque score ( FMPS ) ˂20 % full mouth bleed score ( FMBS ) ˂20 % 4 . No periodontal surgery experimental site 5 . No nauseal reflection 1 . Smoking 2 . The presence systemic disease 3 . Bad oral hygiene 4 . The history periodontal surgery experimental site 5 . Nauseal reflection
